segments.text: Is there any chance to further study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nope . Our company is private-owned and its profit is the biggest issue . We don't think that further study has anything to do with our development and profit-making .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have training program or plan for employees ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nope . We just hope our employees will make profit for us .
segments.speaker: S2
